data.eml:eml: New species of the genus Glyphobythus Raffray, 1904 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hlaváč, Peter, Brachat, Volker (2015): New species of the genus Glyphobythus Raffray, 1904 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from Turkey. Zootaxa 3904 (4): 596-599, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3904.4.9
